item.title: Smooth gradients on iOS/OSX
item.description: UPDATE: Updated for Swift, Swift 2 and packaged into a drop-in replacement for UIView. I thought drawing gradients on iOS is easy. Well, until our designer gave me this: I went on and implemented the drawRect: method on a custom UIView. I used CGGradient and wrote the drawing code. I ran the project in the simulator and noticed that the gradient was quite different. Ran on the device, same thing.
